title: A Touch of Steel
description: WELCOME TO THE SILVER WARRIORS CHRONICLE:For a thousand years, the earth’s sun has changed the course of human history and centuries of conflict have resulted in a fragile balance between an agrarian rural society and the technologically advanced City. But not everyone is satisfied with the status quo...BOOK 1: A TOUCH OF STEELSara Ramirez is a young, talented inventor working in the small town of Los Santos. But when her latest prototype is stolen, she travels to the City and enlists the help of her ex-lover, the wealthy Jordan Steele, to get it back. Together, they must stop unknown enemies from using Sara's invention to change the balance of power in their world—before it's too late.Jordan Steele had once driven away the woman he loved. But now Sara is back, and she won't escape him so easily a second time.**This is a second-chance romantic suspense short story.**
author: Francis Rondon
